00020 /**
00021  * Maps message types to
00022  * a human readable form
00023  */
00024 const char *messages_text[] = {
00025         "**invalid**",
00026 
00027         "shutdown",
00028         "timer",
00029 
00030         "phidget_device",
00031         "phidget_digital_states",
00032         "phidget_digital_set_states"
00033 
00034 };

00037 // PRIVATE
00038 char *__logFilePath = "/var/log/phidgetmanager";
00039 pthread_t __messages_thread;
00040 
00041 void __messages_log_message(bus_message_type type);
00042 void __messages_log(const char *fmt, ... );
00043 void *__messages_thread_function(void* arg);
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 void messages_init(void) {
00048 
00049         pthread_create( &__messages_thread, NULL, __messages_thread_function, NULL );
00050 
00051 }//
00052 
00053 void *__messages_thread_function(void* arg) {
00054 
00055         litm_connection *conn=NULL;
00056         litm_code code, code1, code2;
00057 
00058         code = litm_connect_ex_wait(&conn, LITM_ID_MESSAGES, 0);
00059         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code) {
00060                 doLog( LOG_ERR, "messages: cannot connect to LITM" );
00061                 return NULL;
00062         }
00063 
00064         code1 = litm_subscribe_wait( conn, LITM_BUS_MESSAGES, 0);
00065         code2 = litm_subscribe_wait( conn, LITM_BUS_SYSTEM,   0);
00066 
00067         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code1) {
00068                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot subscribe to messages bus");
00069                 return NULL;
00070         }
00071 
00072         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code2) {
00073                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot subscribe to system bus");
00074                 return NULL;
00075         }
00076 
00077 
00078         litm_envelope *e;
00079         bus_message *msg;
00080 
00081         doLog(LOG_INFO, "messages: starting loop" );
00082 
00083         while(1) {
00084 
00085                 code = litm_receive_wait(conn, &e);
00086                 if (LITM_CODE_OK==code) {
00087 
00088                         doLog(LOG_INFO, "messages: RX message" );
00089 
00090                         msg = litm_get_message( e );
00091                         if (NULL!=msg) {
00092                                 bus_message_type type;
00093 
00094                                 type = msg->type;
00095                                 __messages_log_message( type );
00096 
00097                                 // must release no matter what
00098                                 litm_release(conn, e);
00099 
00100                                 if ( MESSAGE_SHUTDOWN == type )
00101                                         break;
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104 
00105 
00106         }//while
00107 
00108         // TODO better shutdown procedure with LITM
00109 
00110         doLog(LOG_INFO, "messages: END thread" );
00111 
00112 }//function
00113 
00114 
00115 void __messages_log_message(bus_message_type type) {
00116 
00117         const char *base = "%s: message type[%s]";
00118         time_t t;
00119         struct tm tm;
00120         char date[50];
00121 
00122         time(&t);
00123         localtime_r(&t, &tm);
00124 
00125         if (!strftime(date, sizeof (date), "%c", &tm))
00126                 strncpy(date, "?", sizeof (date));
00127 
00128         //doLog(LOG_DEBUG,"__messages_log_message: type[%i]", type);
00129         __messages_log(base, date, messages_text[type] );
00130 
00131 }//function
00132 
00133 
00134 void __messages_log( const char *fmt, ... ) {
00135 
00136         va_list va;
00137         FILE *file = NULL;
00138 
00139         file = fopen( __logFilePath, "a" );
00140         if (NULL!=file) {
00141 
00142                 va_start(va, fmt);
00143                 vfprintf(file, fmt, va);
00144                 va_end(va);
00145                 fprintf(file, "\n");
00146                 fflush(file);
00147 
00148         } else {
00149                 doLog( LOG_ERR, "cannot write to log file" );
00150         }
00151 
00152         if (NULL!=file)
00153                 fclose( file );
00154 
00155 }//function
